description: Marin`s best friend. She lives in a large mansion, and her mother doesn`t like Moe associating with Marin, since Marin is `poor.` However, Moe`s friendship stays strong with Marin. Once became possessed by a parasitic Monomakia and became a giant. once when marin was in trouble she found out she didn`t melan capsal so she race through a crowd,barefoot, and trough the rain to give it too her even though she was hurt.She is later infected with the growing momomakia and will grow intil she`s will explod.So she ask melan to kill her before that happens but she is then given the anitdote by erin.
name: Kisaragi Moe
